article_title: Two Injured in Noxubee County Shooting
article_text:
Two people were taken to the hospital after being shot in Noxubee County on Sunday afternoon.

WCBI-TV reports the shooting happened about 1:00 Sunday afternoon in the Cedar Creek community. The Noxubee County Sheriff's Office says one man was shot in the leg and the other in the chest.

Right now, authorities there are questioning three men, but no charges have been filed at this time.

article_metadata.description: Two people are recovering from gunshot wounds in Noxubee County.
